title: Honeywell Introduces HG3900 Tactical-Grade IMU with Enhanced Sensor Accuracy
text:
Honeywell is introducing the HG3900 Inertial Measurement Unit (IMU), a small, lightweight, and low-power tactical-grade device with accuracy and reliability...

The post Honeywell Introduces HG3900 Tactical-Grade IMU with Enhanced Sensor Accuracy appeared first on Unmanned Systems Technology.
